snippet: Style.com’s global take on New York Fashion Week is part of its plan to build on the fashion-hungry audience it has been drawing to its site this year.
abstract: Style.com’s global take on New York Fashion Week is part of its plan to build on the fashion-hungry audience it has been drawing to its site in 2013.
lead_paragraph: Style.com’s global take on New York Fashion Week is part of its plan to build on the fashion-hungry audience it has been drawing to its site this year.

headline.main: Covering the Runway From Beyond New York
headline.print_headline: Covering the Runway From Beyond New York
